sense.def:
One's throat
je zadnji del človekove ustne votline in zgornji del cevi v vratu.

seg.quote: His throat was so dry that he could hardly swallow.

sense.def:
One's throat
je tudi sprednji del človekovega vratu.

seg.quote: He grabbed the man by the throat.

sense.def:
Kadar sta dve osebi ali skupini
at each other's throats
, se prepirata ali tepeta.

To ram
ali
to force something down someone's throat
pomeni nekomu vztrajno ponavljati nekaj, da bi tisto sprejel ali začel verjeti.

cit.quote: pitati s čim, vsiljevati, posiljevati s čim

seg.quote: They have this viewpoint rammed down their throats every day.
